statements: SELECT * FROM clinical_trials_healthcare_robotics;
SELECT trial_id, treatment_name FROM clinical_trials_healthcare_robotics WHERE patient_id = 101;
SELECT treatment_description, trial_start_date FROM clinical_trials_healthcare_robotics WHERE trial_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials_healthcare_robotics ORDER BY trial_start_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_name, trial_end_date FROM clinical_trials_healthcare_robotics WHERE trial_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials_healthcare_robotics WHERE patient_id = 123
SELECT trial_id, treatment_name FROM clinical_trials_healthcare_robotics WHERE trial_start_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY trial_start_date DESC
SELECT patient_id, treatment_name, trial_end_date FROM clinical_trials_healthcare_robotics WHERE treatment_name LIKE '%surgery%'
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials_healthcare_robotics WHERE trial_start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01'
SELECT trial_id, treatment_name, trial_end_date FROM clinical_trials_healthcare_robotics WHERE patient_id = 456 ORDER BY trial_end_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age < 30;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM Treatments WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, treatment_name FROM Patients INNER JOIN Treatments ON Patients.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, treatment_name FROM Patients INNER JOIN Treatments ON Patients.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Treatments.treatment_name FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id WHERE Treatments.cost > 1000
SELECT patient_name, age, doctor_name FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id WHERE Treatments.cost < 500
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_female_patients FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT * FROM robotics_trials;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data;
SELECT trial_id, treatment, trial_date FROM robotics_trials WHERE trial_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, outcome FROM patient_data JOIN trial_results ON patient_data.patient_id = trial_results.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, outcome, analysis_summary FROM patient_data JOIN trial_results ON patient_data.patient_id = trial_results.patient_id WHERE outcome = 'Positive';
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT trial_id, treatment, trial_date FROM robotics_trials ORDER BY trial_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT trial_id, outcome, analysis_summary FROM trial_results WHERE result_id < 100 ORDER BY trial_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM robotics_trials rt INNER JOIN patient_data pd ON rt.patient_id = pd.patient_id WHERE pd.gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, location FROM patients ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT trial_id, treatment, start_date FROM trials WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM treatments WHERE cost < 1000;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patients.patient_id, patient_name, treatment FROM patients JOIN trials ON patients.patient_id = trials.patient_id WHERE trials.treatment = 'Chemotherapy';
SELECT patient_name, gender, location, description FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age, outcome FROM patients JOIN outcomes ON patients.patient_id = outcomes.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM trials WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender='M';
SELECT patient_name, age, treatment_name FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.treatment_id = treatments.treatment_id;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date, lead_researcher FROM trials ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, specialty FROM researchers WHERE specialty='Oncology';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;

SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, result FROM patients JOIN trial_results ON patients.patient_id = trial_results.patient_id JOIN trials ON trial_results.trial_id = trials.trial_id JOIN treatments ON trials.treatment_id = treatments.treatment_id;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date, researcher_name FROM trials JOIN researchers ON trials.lead_researcher = researchers.researcher_name;

SELECT patient_name, age, gender, treatment_name, result FROM patients JOIN trial_results ON patients.patient_id = trial_results.patient_id JOIN trials ON trial_results.trial_id = trials.trial_id JOIN treatments ON trials.treatment_id = treatments.treatment_id WHERE age > 40;
